name: current weather function
create table current
func:
msg.topic = 'create table current_weather (lat NUMBER,lon NUMBER,time TEXT UNIQUE ,temperature_2m NUMBER,wind_speed_10m NUMBER,relative_humidity_2m NUMBER,rain NUMBER,snowfall NUMBER,cloud_cover NUMBER,measurement_time TEXT)';
return msg;

name: return table current
func:
msg.topic='select * from current_weather';
return msg;
